ARABIC: وَوَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Word will be carried out against them for the wrong they did and they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the Word will come to pass against them because of their wrong-doing: they will then be able to utter nothing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will become subject to punishment because of their injustice. Thus, they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the Word has appeared upon them because of their injustice, so now they do not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Word will be fulfilled against them, because they have done wrong, and they will be unable to speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the word shall come to pass against them because they were unjust, so they shall not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the Word shall fall upon them because of the evil they committed, while they speak naught.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the Word will be fulfilled concerning them because they have done wrong, and they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The verdict will be given against them, because they did wrong, and they will be speechless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Word shall be fulfilled concerning them, because they did wrong, and they shall not be able to speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the word [of judgement] shall fall upon them for their wrongdoing, and they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Word will be fulfilled against them, because of their wrong-doing, and they will be unable to speak (in plea).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the Word (of torment) will be fulfilled against them, because they have done wrong, and they will be unable to speak (in order to defend themselves).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the Word shall fall upon them because of the evil they committed, and they shall be speechless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Word will come down upon them for their wrongdoing, and they will not speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:85] And the word [of judgement] shall fall, the chastisement will be due, upon them because of the evil they committed, that is, [because of] what they associated [with God], and they will not speak, since they will have no [valid] argument.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the Word will be fulfilled concerning them) that they will incur a punishment and a curse (because they have done wrong) because of their disbelief and idolatry, (and they will not speak) they will not answer back.
